extendedInfo.description: The Ultimate Unit Converter. A unit conversion tool with support for more than 2000 units in 30+ categories including Length, Temperature, Speed, Volume, Weight, Area, Currency conversions. It also has support for user preferences.Same as free but no ads and has support for user preferences- Added menu button to switch units** UPDATE **- Fixed screen size bug for larger screens

reviews.title: Just fantastic
reviews.comment: The developer is great. He was able to fix an issue I had, and do it quickly! This program has every conversion I would ever need, and looks great too
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too many option

reviews.comment: Awesome program. Clearly laid out design, easy to navigate. 5 stars when I have the ability to move to SD. ALL non-phone programs should be this way!
